My Work

Some of my projects...

Project 1

442 acres area of Plant and 132 acres area of Township at NFL Panipat was surveyed and reference points were fixed for construction of Plant & Township and also was associated in construction of the same.

Project 2

Construction of Ammonia Feed Stock Change over Project at NFL Panipat by L& T on turnkey basis.

Project 3

Construction of Captive Power Plant of 30 MW (from soil testing to commissioning of plant).

Project 4

Revamping of ESP system.

Project 5

Construction of parallel type wooden Cooling Towers, filtration plant.

Project 6

Construction of residential quarters, public buildings, roads, sewers at NFL Panipat.

Project 7

Construction of 25000 MTPA Sulphur Bentonite Plant at NFL Panipat.
